rules.natural: Either the vehicle polluted the river, or the vehicle contaminated the forest.
Under the condition that a grant funded the reforestation project, if a tree was planted on the riverbank, then a tree thrives on the riverbank.
Either water quality is monitored in the river, or, if the environment does not improve in the region, then soil quality increases in the forest.
Either biodiversity decreases in the forest, or it is not the case that water quality is monitored in the river.
Whenever the wetland is protected by law, biodiversity does not decrease in the forest.
If the urban area expands into the forest, then it is not the case that the urban area preserves the forest.
The urban area expands into the forest, or the environment improves in the region.

rules.prover9_expression: (violates(industry, regulation) | (supported(conservation_policy, community) -> (enacted(conservation_policy, city) | (expands(urban_area, forest) -> preserves(urban_area, forest)))))
rules.natural: Either the industry violates the regulation, or, if the community supported the conservation policy, then either the city enacted a conservation policy, or, if the urban area expands into the forest, then the urban area preserves the forest.
If the vehicle contaminated the forest, then the environment improves in the region.
Whenever the agency fined the industry, the industry does not violate the regulation.
Either the agency fined the industry, or the agency warned the industry.
If the agency warned the industry, then the industry does not violate the regulation.

Provided that fossil fuel causes air pollution, then, under the condition that vehicle pollution occurs during the dry season, if the vehicle polluted the river, the environment improves in the region.
If biodiesel causes air pollution, then, under the condition that vehicle pollution occurs during the dry season, if the vehicle polluted the river, the environment improves in the region.
If fossil fuel is extracted from a well, then fossil fuel causes air pollution.
Either fossil fuel is extracted from a well, or biodiesel is produced at a plant.
Whenever biodiesel is produced at a plant, biodiesel causes air pollution.
Provided that a tree requires sunlight, then, if a tree was planted on the riverbank, a tree thrives on the riverbank.
A tree requires sunlight, or a tree requires water.
Provided that a tree requires water, a tree requires nutrients.
Under the condition that a tree requires nutrients, if a tree was planted on the riverbank, then a tree thrives on the riverbank.
If a conservation effort promotes biodiversity, then biodiversity does not decrease in the forest.
Vehicle pollution occurs during the dry season, or vehicle pollution occurs during the rainy season.
Provided that a conservation effort involves reforestation, the conservation effort promotes biodiversity.
If a conservation effort involves wetland protection, then the conservation effort promotes biodiversity.
Under the condition that a donation funded the conservation effort, the conservation effort involves reforestation.
Either a donation funded the conservation effort, or a tax funded the conservation effort.
If a tax funded the conservation effort, then the tax is allocated to conservation.
Provided that the tax is allocated to conservation, the conservation effort involves wetland protection.
Whenever fertilizer is applied to the soil, fertilizer enriches the soil.
Provided that fertilizer enriches the soil, soil quality increases in the forest.
If the council approved the conservation policy, then the city enacted the conservation policy.
Under the condition that the council proposed the conservation policy, if the urban area expands into the forest, then the urban area preserves the forest.
Provided that vehicle pollution occurs during the rainy season, if the vehicle polluted the river, the environment improves in the region.
If the council reviewed the conservation policy, then the council rejected the conservation policy.
Whenever the vehicle uses fossil fuel, then, under the condition that vehicle pollution occurs during the dry season, if the vehicle polluted the river, the environment improves in the region.
Provided that the vehicle uses biodiesel, then, if vehicle pollution occurs during the dry season, whenever the vehicle polluted the river, the environment improves in the region.
If vehicle pollution is documented, then either the vehicle uses fossil fuel, or the vehicle uses biodiesel.
Provided that a tree was planted on the riverbank, a tree does not thrive on the riverbank.
Whenever it is not the case that either the council approved the conservation policy or the council proposed the conservation policy, the council reviewed the conservation policy.
If vehicle pollution is not documented, then a tree was planted on the riverbank.
If the environment does not improve in the region, then fertilizer is applied to the soil.
Under the condition that the environment does not improve in the region, soil quality does not increase in the forest.
